pilots.name: DFS-311

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Scouting Drone
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-3.

pilots.name: DFS-081

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Preservation Programming
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token to change all [Critical Hit] results to [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Precise Hunter

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Pinpoint Protocols
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may reroll 1 blank result.

pilots.name: Separatist Drone
pilots.text: As the Clone Wars escalate, the Separatist Alliance continues to develop the technology of droid starfighters, as well as the tactical droids that command them.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Haor Chall Prototype

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Xi Char Offering
pilots.ability: After an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 0-2 declares another friendly ship as the defender, you may perform a [Calculate] or [Lock] action.

pilots.name: Trade Federation Drone
pilots.text: The Trade Federation deployed countless Vulture Droids at the Battle of Naboo, and continues to use these inexpensive starfighters in the Clone Wars.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Haor Chall Prototype

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Xi Char Offering
pilots.ability: After an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 0-2 declares another friendly ship as the defender, you may perform a [Calculate] or [Lock] action.

pilots.caption: Sinister Automaton
pilots.ability: After you defend, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform an action.

pilots.name: Dark Courier
pilots.text: The vessel called the Scimitar was heavily modified, equipped with stealth technologies and advanced surveillance devices for infiltration and assassination missions.

pilots.name: Darth Maul
pilots.caption: Sith Assassin
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, you may spend 2 [Force] to perform a bonus primary attack against a different target. If your attack missed, you may perform that bonus primary attack against the same target instead.

pilots.name: Count Dooku
pilots.caption: Darth Tyranus
pilots.ability: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 of your blue or red tokens. After you perform an attack that hits, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform an action.

pilots.name: Captain Sear
pilots.caption: Kage Infiltrator
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs a primary attack, if the defender is in its [Bullseye Arc], before the Neutralize Results step, the friendly ship may spend 1 calculate token to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Feethan Ottraw Autopilot
pilots.text: Unlike the more disposable fighters it also built for the Separatists, Feethan Ottraw Scalable Assemblies designed the Belbullab-22 with a solid mix of firepower, durability, and speed.

pilots.name: General Grievous
pilots.caption: Ambitious Cyborg
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.name: Wat Tambor
pilots.caption: Techno Union Foreman
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each calculating friendly ship at range 1 of the defender.

pilots.name: Skakoan Ace
pilots.text: With its powerful engines, devastating triple laser cannons, and high customizability, the Belbullab-22 is the chosen craft of several elite Separatist Alliance pilots, including the infamous General Grievous.

pilots.name: Techno Union Bomber
pilots.text: Baktoid Armor Workshop developed the Hyena as a strike craft compatible with Trade Federation Vulture swarm tactics.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Bombardment Drone

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Time on Target
pilots.ability: If you would drop a device, you may launch that device instead, using the same template.

pilots.name: DBS-404

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Preservation Protocol Not Found
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, you must roll 1 additional die. After the attack hits, suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

pilots.name: Baktoid Prototype

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Function over Form
pilots.ability: While you perform a special attack, if a friendly ship with the Networked Calculations ship ability has a lock on the defender, you may ignore the [Focus], [Calculate], or [Lock] requirement of that attack.

pilots.name: Separatist Bomber
pilots.text: The droid armies of the Separatists are callous to the plight of civilians and make no effort to limit collateral damage.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: DBS-32C

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Droid Control Signal Relay
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform a [Coordinate] action. You cannot coordinate ships that do not have the Networked Calculations ship ability.

pilots.name: Colicoid Interceptor
pilots.text: Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and manufactured by Phlac-Arphocc Automata Industries, the heuristic processors of Droid Tri-Fighters allow these deadly ships to analyze and adapt to enemy tactics in-flight.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: DIS-347

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Target Acquired
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may acquire a lock on an object at range 1-3 that has a friendly lock.

pilots.name: DIS-T81

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Clever Circuits
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship in the enemy ship's firing arc to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Fearsome Predator

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Fixated Pursuit
pilots.ability: Setup: After placing forces, assign the Fearful Prey condition to 1 enemy ship.

pilots.name: Phlac-Arphocc Prototype

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Predictive Analysis Protocol
pilots.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend your lock on a ship to look at that ship's dial.

pilots.name: Separatist Interceptor
pilots.text: Deployed late in the Clone Wars, these aggressive starfighters, and the destructive buzz droids they carry, pose a serious threat to even veteran Jedi pilots.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Boba Fett
pilots.caption: Survivor
pilots.ability: While you defend, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may change 1 of your blank results to a [Focus] result.

pilots.name: Separatist Racketeer
pilots.text: Emboldened by the bitter stalemate of the Outer Rim Sieges, mercenary groups across the galaxy take the opportunity to profit from the ongoing war.

pilots.name: Jango Fett
pilots.caption: Simple Man
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the difficulty of your revealed maneuver is less than that of the enemy ship's, you may change 1 of the enemy ship's [Focus] results to a blank result.

pilots.name: Zam Wesell
pilots.caption: Clawdite Changeling
pilots.ability: Setup: Lose 2 [Charge]. During the System Phase, you may assign 1 of your secret conditions to yourself facedown: “You Should Thank Me” or “You'd Better Mean Business”

pilots.name: Baktoid Drone
pilots.text: A late-war development for the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the droid gunship uses specialized repulsors to nimbly strafe targets and precisely drop battle droids.

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.name: DGS-047

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.caption: Adaptive Intelligence
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], you may acquire a lock on it. Then, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], it gains 1 strain token.

pilots.name: Geonosian Prototype

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.caption: Devastation Protocols
pilots.ability: While you perform a [Missile] or [Cannon] attack, you may remove 1 tractor token from the defender to reroll up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.name: Onderon Oppressor

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.caption: Atmospheric Attack Module
pilots.ability: After you barrel roll or sideslip, if you are stressed, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.name: Separatist Predator
pilots.text: Armed with ordnance and protected by ray shields, a droid gunship can devastate Republic infantry formations and starfighters with equal proficiency.

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.name: DGS-286

shipAbility.name: Networked Aim
shipAbility.text: You cannot spend your locks to reroll attack dice. While you perform an attack, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to the number of friendly locks on the defender.

pilots.caption: Ambush Protocols
pilots.ability: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship transfers 1 calculate token to you.

pilots.name: Berwer Kret

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.caption: Hive Guard Captain
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, each friendly ship with [Calculate] on its action bar and a lock on the defender may perform a red [Calculate] action.

pilots.name: Chertek

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.caption: Opportunistic Ace
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is tractored, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.name: Gorgol

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.caption: Handy Engineer
pilots.ability: During the System Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token and choose a friendly ship at range 1-2. If you do, it gains 1 tractor token, then repairs 1 of its faceup Ship trait damage cards.

pilots.name: Petranaki Arena Ace
pilots.text: The Petranaki Arena is a massive edifice on Geonosis that was a key site in the first battle of the Clone Wars.

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.name: Stalgasin Hive Guard
pilots.text: Designed for the unique physiology of Geonosian pilots, Nantex-class starfighters are capable of maneuvers that would rip most ships—and pilots—apart.

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.name: Sun Fac

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.caption: Archduke’s Enforcer
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is tractored, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Separatist Privateers
pilots.text: The Separatist Alliance makes use of all manner of unsavory contacts in its fight against the Galactic Republic, including corsairs and criminal cartels.

shipAbility.name: Overdrive Burners
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if your revealed maneuver is speed 3-5, roll 1 additional defense die.

pilots.name: Separatist Privateers
pilots.text: The Separatist Alliance makes use of all manner of unsavory contacts in its fight against the Galactic Republic, including corsairs and criminal cartels.

shipAbility.name: Overdrive Burners
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if your revealed maneuver is speed 3-5, roll 1 additional defense die.

pilots.name: Colicoid Destroyer
pilots.text: Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and equipped with powerful tentacles and a massive drill to tear though the hull of even the toughest starships and fortifications, the Trident-class Assault Ship is a terrifying testament to the threat posed by the Separatist Alliance.

shipAbility.name: Tractor Grasp
shipAbility.text: After you perform a Tractor Tentacles attack that hits, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Colicoid Destroyer
pilots.text: Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and equipped with powerful tentacles and a massive drill to tear though the hull of even the toughest starships and fortifications, the Trident-class Assault Ship is a terrifying testament to the threat posed by the Separatist Alliance.

shipAbility.text: After you perform a Tractor Tentacles attack that hits, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: IG-111

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: One Eye
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that missed, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] and gain 1 deplete token. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

pilots.name: MagnaGuard Protector

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Implacable Escort
pilots.ability: After placing forces, assign the Guarded condition to 1 friendly ship other than MagnaGuard Protector.

pilots.name: MagnaGuard Executioner
pilots.text: In addition to guarding Separatist leaders, MagneGuard droids are sometimes dispatched in swift Rogue-class Starfighters to eliminate their enemies.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Cad Bane

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

pilots.caption: Needs No Introduction
pilots.ability: During the Engagement Phase, after another ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform an action, even while stressed.

pilots.name: IG-101

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Tenacious Bodyguard
pilots.ability: At the start of the System Phase, you may repair 1 faceup damage card.

pilots.name: IG-102

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Dueling Droid
pilots.ability: While you defend, if the attacker's initiative is equal to or greater than yours, you may change 1 blank result to a [Focus] result.

pilots.name: Pre Vizsla
pilots.caption: Leader of Death Watch
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender's initiative is equal to or greater than yours, you may spend 2  to roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Bo-Katan Kryze
pilots.caption: Vizsla's Lieutenant
pilots.ability: Before a friendly ship at range 0-2 activates, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship may gain 1 strain token to remove 1 non-stress red or orange token.
